text: Sabab khianat janji ngon Allah Sabab jiubah janji nyan di jih Kamoe laknat jih Neukheun le Allah Kamoe peujeuet lom ate jih batat Jibalek ayat jiubah-ubah Narit lam kitab jituka-taki Tan teuingat le peue geupeurintah Ka geupeuingat di jih yoh dilee Jinoe meuteuntee teuwo jih sudah Jinoe takalon awak nyan sabe Khianat ate jipubuet salah Na meupadum droe nyang kon lagee nyan Teuma bandum nyan beu tapeumeuÊ»ah Tapeuhah ate teuh keu awaknyan Ureueng got meunan galak that leupah Tuhan Neugaseh ureueng pubuet got
